hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base

Class CircularBuffer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.CircularBuffer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the contained element type

    public class CircularBuffer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple circular buffer with absolute indices.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.04.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a new circular buffer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircularBuffer

        public CircularBuffer(int size)
        Construct a new circular buffer.
        Parameters:
        size - the buffer size

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(T value)
        Add a new value to the buffer. If the buffer would overflow, it automatically removes the current head element.
        Parameters:
        value - the value

      • get

        public T get(int index)
        Retrieve a buffer element based on an absolute index.
        Parameters:
        index - the absolute index
        Returns:
        the value

      • take

        public T take()
        Returns:
        Takes the head of the buffer.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        is the buffer empty?

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        the current size of the buffer.

      • head

        public int head()
        Returns:
        the current head index.

      • tail

        public int tail()
        Returns:
        the current tail index.
